pr_title: Clarify how to use orderBy parameter in executeMetadataQuery

timeline.message:
Clarify how to use orderBy parameter in executeMetadataQuery

Add orderBy and indexName parameters to `executeMetadataQuery(BoxAPIConnection api, String from, String query, JsonObject queryParameters, String ancestorFolderId, String indexName, JsonArray orderBy)` example to more closely mimic the REST API

timeline.bodyText: @randyjohnston what is this null here for? Is this the index name? Would it make sense to expand this example to just show how to use everything?
timeline.author: cbetta

replies.bodyText: Yes, it's the index name or use_index param in the POST request body. We may want to clarify that this is optional depending on the number of metadata template instances.
replies.author: randyjohnston
